title: Gemini 3.0 Pro
description: A deep learning model that can replicate and modify existing websites, including OS clones and SVG sites, using a canvas-based interface.

title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Fix
description: A patch to the ChatGPT model that reduces the overuse of the 'm-dash' punctuation mark, improving the model's ability to generate human-like text.

title: Thermodynamic Computing
description: A proposed approach to computing that uses thermal noise to achieve potentially significant efficiency gains, potentially leading to more powerful AI systems.
